description:
This installment of the Auditions series brings you a few more hot hopefuls that we've had the pleasure of filming. Actually, I have a new assistant photographer who has been helping out and it seems he has a real knack for making the guys feel comfortable.
Gay. A real cutie with sparkling eyes and a great smile. He had contacted us via the website expressing an interest in modeling (he's a top). Very nice guy with a great personality! I'm very anxious to get him back for more!
Bisexual — has a girlfriend. 18-year-old runner with a smooth body and nice ass. Said he's never been fucked and wants to try it.
Straight. His friend had sent us his picture. Lean, tight little body on this one!
title: Auditions 13
